current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to include in any proposed rule
			 that limits greenhouse gas emissions and imposes increased costs on other
			 Federal agencies an offset from funds available to the Administrator for
			 all projected increased costs that the proposed rule would impose on other
			 Federal agencies.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Environment and Public Works

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Agency PAYGO for Greenhouse Gases Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Agency PAYGO for Greenhouse Gases Act

proposes a rule that limits

Administrator of the Environmental Protection

text.#text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, if the

a Federal agency on which the rule imposes increased costs may not pass the costs imposed by the
			 rule on to any rate payer of the Federal agency; and
shall be considered to be  a rule that imposes increased costs on a Federal agency; and
shall be subject to this section.
